title: 3 Simple Ways to Remove Likes on Facebook Posts and Pages

steps.title: Go to the Page you want to unlike.
steps.content: Go to the Page you want to unlike. If you changed your mind about liking a Facebook Page and don't want it to appear on your profile , you can easily unlike it from the page. [1] X Research source To find the Page, just start typing its name into the search bar , then tap it in the results. When you unlike a Page, you will no longer see posts from that Page on your feed.

steps.title: Click or tap Liked at the top of the page.
steps.content: Click or tap Liked at the top of the page. You'll see this button at the top of the page. If you're using a computer, this will instantly unlike the Page. If you're using an Android, iPhone, or iPad, you'll have one more step.

steps.title: Tap Unlike to unlike the Page.
steps.content: Tap Unlike to unlike the Page. This removes your like from the Page and prevents it from appearing on your profile. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap ☰ in the Facebook mobile app.
steps.content: Tap ☰ in the Facebook mobile app. It's in the bottom-right corner of the screen (iPhone) or at the top of the screen with your profile picture (Android). A menu will appear.

steps.title: Tap your name.
steps.content: Tap your name. You'll see it at the top of the menu.

steps.title: Tap the three horizontal dots ••• .
steps.content: Tap the three horizontal dots ••• . You'll see this icon next to "Edit Profile."

steps.title: Tap Activity Log.
steps.content: Tap Activity Log . It's near the middle of the page. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Interactions.
steps.content: Tap Interactions . This expands a list of different interaction types, including your likes and comments.

steps.title: Tap Likes and Reactions.
steps.content: Tap Likes and Reactions . Doing so opens a list of posts that you've liked (or reacted to).

steps.title: Tap the three dots next to a post or photo you've liked.
steps.content: Tap the three dots next to a post or photo you've liked. A menu will expand. If you want to delete all of your likes, tap the checkbox next to "All" at the top-left corner instead, and then tap Remove .

steps.title: Tap Unlike.
steps.content: Tap Unlike . This removes the like from the select post or photo.

steps.title: Click your profile picture at the top of Facebook.
steps.content: Click your profile picture at the top of Facebook. It's in the top right corner of the page and will prompt a menu to drop down.

steps.title: Click Settings & privacy.
steps.content: Click Settings & privacy . This is usually the first listing on the menu next to an icon of a gear and clicking it will change the menu to display more options.

steps.title: Click Activity log.
steps.content: Click Activity log . You'll see this near the bottom of the menu. Doing so opens the Activity Log page. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Click Interactions.
steps.content: Click Interactions . It's a tab on the left side of the page next to a thumbs-up icon. When you click it, the menu under "Interactions" will expand and your options on the right side of your browser window will change.

steps.title: Click Likes and reactions.
steps.content: Click Likes and reactions . You'll see this in the expanded menu on the left side of the window.

steps.title: Select the posts and photos you want to unlike.
steps.content: Select the posts and photos you want to unlike. If you want to unlike everything, click the All checkbox at the top of the right panel. If you just want to remove a few likes, click the checkboxes for each post or photo you want to unlike. [5] X Research source If you want to remove likes from a certain time period, use the calendar icon in the top right corner to select a time range and filter your results.

steps.title: Click Remove.
steps.content: Click Remove . You'll see this on the right side of the page. It'll darken from a grey text to black when you have a box checked. Doing this will remove this interaction, or unlike this post or comment, from your account. You may need to confirm your password before everything selected is removed. If you don't see it , click Manage sections and check the boxes next to "Likes" to show it in the menu. After it's checked, click Save and open the menu again.

steps.title: Hover your mouse over a page.
steps.content: Hover your mouse over a page. Not each thumbnail is a page you can like, some you can only follow . Move your mouse to a page that you can unlike.

steps.title: Click Liked.
steps.content: Click Liked . The icon will turn grey to indicate that you don't "Like" that page. If the page says "Following" instead, click the Page's icon (to go to their Facebook page) and click Liked next to the thumbs-up icon. Click the toggle next to "Unlike this Page" and Update to remove that Page from your "Like List." [6] X Research source
